scripts.deploy:dev: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-desyn.js && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-bactions.js
scripts.deploy:local: npx hardhat run --network local scripts/deploy-desyn.js && npx hardhat run --network local scripts/deploy-bactions.js && npx hardhat run --network local scripts/deploy-mock-tokens.js
scripts.deploy:test: npx hardhat run --network local scripts/deploy-desyn.js && npx hardhat run --network local scripts/deploy-bactions.js
scripts.deploy:kovan: npx hardhat run --network kovan scripts/deploy-desyn.js && npx hardhat run --network kovan scripts/deploy-bactions.js
